entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Red Deer
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:56 PM MST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -13.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Red Deer Regional Airport 01:14 AM MST Friday 30 December 2022
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -13.9°C
Pressure: 100.5 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -15.7°C
Wind: SW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:11 PM MST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:11 PM MST Thursday 29 December 2022
